ne, ak airzeiþ þo managein.
JOHN 7.13 nih þan ainshun sweþauh balþaba rodida bi ina in agisis Iudaie.
JOHN 7.14 iþ juþan ana midjai dulþ usstaig Iesus in alh jah laisida.
JOHN 7.15 jah sildaleikidedun manageins qiþandans:
ƕaiwa sa bokos kann unuslaisiþs?
JOHN 7.16 andhof þan Iesus jah qaþ:
so meina laiseins nist meina, ak þis sandjandins mik.
JOHN 7.17 jabai ƕas wili wiljan is taujan, ufkunnaiþ bi þo laisein framuh guda sijai, þau iku fram mis silbin rodja.
JOHN 7.18 saei fram sis silbin rodeiþ, hauhiþa seina sokeiþ;
iþ saei sokeiþ hauhiþa þis sandjandins sik, sah sunjeins ist jah inwindiþa in imma nist.
JOHN 7.19 niu Moses gaf izwis witoþ?
jah ni ainshun izwara taujiþ þata witoþ;
ƕa mik sokeiþ usqiman?
JOHN 7.20 andhof so managei jah qeþun:
unhulþon habais;
ƕas þuk sokeiþ usqiman?
JOHN 7.21 andhof Iesus jah qaþ du im:
ain waurstw gatawida, jah allai sildaleikeiþ.
JOHN 7.22 duþþe Moses atgaf izwis bimait, ni þatei fram Mose sijai, ak us attam, jah in sabbato bimaitiþ mannan.
JOHN 7.23 jabai bimait nimiþ manna in sabbato, ei ni gatairaidau witoþ þata Mosezis; iþ mis hatizoþ, unte allana mannan hailana gatawida in sabbato?
JOHN 7.24 ni stojaiþ bi siunai, ak þo garaihton staua stojaiþ.
JOHN 7.25 qeþunuh þan sumai þize Iairusaulwmeite:
niu sa ist þammei sokjand usqiman?
JOHN 7.26 jah sai,
andaugiba rodeiþ jah waiht du imma ni qiþand;
ibai aufto bi sunjai ufkunþedun þai reiks þatei sa ist bi sunjai Xristus?
JOHN 7.27 akei þana kunnum, ƕaþro ist;
iþ Xristus, biþe qimiþ, ni manna wait ƕaþro ist.
JOHN 7.28 hropida þan in alh laisjands Iesus jah qiþands:
jah mik kunnuþ jah wituþ ƕaþro im;
jah af mis silbin ni qam, ak ist sunjeins saei sandida mik, þanei jus ni kunnuþ.
JOHN 7.29 iþ ik kann ina, unte fram imma im, jah is mik insandida.
JOHN 7.30 sokidedun þan ina gafahan, jah ni ainshun uslagida ana ina handu, unte nauhþanuh ni atiddja ƕeila is.
JOHN 7.31 iþ managai þizos manageins galaubidedun imma jah qeþun: ei
Xristus, þan qimiþ, ibai managizeins taiknins taujai þaimei sa tawida?
JOHN 7.32 hausidedun þan Fareisaieis þo managein birodjandein bi ina þata. in-sandidedun-uh andbahtans þai Fareisaieis jah þai auhumistans gudjans, ei gafaifaheina ina.
JOHN 7.33 þanuh qaþ Iesus:
nauh leitila ƕeila miþ izwis im, jah þan gagga du þamma sandjandin mik.
JOHN 7.34 sokeiþ mik jah ni bigitiþ, jah þarei im ik, jus ni maguþ qiman.
JOHN 7.35 þaruh qeþun þai Iudaieis du sis misso:
ƕadre sa skuli gaggan, þei weis ni bigitaima ina?
nibai in distahein þiudo skuli gaggan jah laisjan þiudos?
JOHN 7.36 ƕa sijai þata waurd, þatei qaþ:
sokeiþ mik jah ni bigitiþ, jah þarei im ik, jus ni maguþ qiman?
JOHN 7.37 iþ in spedistin daga þamma mikilin dulþais stoþ Iesus jah hropida qiþands:
jabai ƕana þaursjai, gaggai du mis jah driggkai.
JOHN 7.38 saei galaubeiþ du mis, swaswe qaþ gameleins, aƕos us wambai is rinnand watins libandins.
JOHN 7.39 þatuh þan qaþ bi ahman þanei skuldedun niman þai galaubjandans du imma;
unte ni nauhþanuh was ahma sa weiha ana im, unte Iesus nauhþanuh ni hauhiþs was.
JOHN 7.40 managai þan þizos manageins hausjandans þize waurde qeþun:
sa ist bi sunjai sa praufetes.
JOHN 7.41 sumaih qeþun:
sa ist Xristus.
sumaih qeþun:
ibai þau us Galeilaia Xristus qimiþ?
JOHN 7.42 niu gameleins qaþ þatei us fraiwa Daweidis jah us Beþlaihaim weihsa, þarei was Daweid, Xristus qimiþ?
JOHN 7.43 þanuh missaqiss in þizai managein warþ bi ina.
JOHN 7.44 sumaih þan ize wildedun fahan ina;
akei ni ainshun uslagida ana ina handuns.
JOHN 7.45 galiþun þan þai andbahtos du þaim auhumistam gudjam jah Fareisaium;
